content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Pulau Seringat" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(November 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Pulau Seringat** is an island off the south coast of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), and part of the [Southern Islands](/wiki/Southern_Islands) region. In 2006, Pulau Seringat and [Lazarus Island](/wiki/Lazarus_Island) were linked by a [sand bank](/wiki/Sand_bank). 1°14′N 103°51′E﻿ / ﻿1.233°N 103.850°E﻿ / 1.233; 103.850 This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Pulau Seringat
